# JythonMusic

JythonMusic is a software environment for learning and developing algorithmic art projects.  It is a Python port of [JythonMusic ](https://jythonmusic.me/api-reference/), powered by [PySide6](https://wiki.qt.io/Qt_for_Python) and [portaudio](http://portaudio.com/).

- [Homepage](https://jythonmusic.me/)

JythonMusic is distributed under the MIT License.
This package is still under development.
